verses.verse: He that is <S%H1795>wounded<s%> in the stones, or has his <S%H8212>privy<s%> member <S%H3772>cut<s%> off, shall not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

A <S%H4464>bastard<s%> shall not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> to his <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> shall he not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

An <S%H5984>Ammonite<s%> or <S%H4125>Moabite<s%> shall not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> to their <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> shall they not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for <S%H5769>ever:<s%>

<S%H5921>Because<s%> they <S%H6923>met<s%> you not with <S%H3899>bread<s%> and with <S%H4325>water<s%> in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> when you <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and <S%H834>because<s%> they <S%H7936>hired<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> of <S%H6604>Pethor<s%> of <S%H763>Mesopotamia,<s%> to <S%H7043>curse<s%> you.

Nevertheless the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam;<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2015>turned<s%> the <S%H7045>curse<s%> into a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> to you, <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> you.
You shall not <S%H1875>seek<s%> their <S%H7965>peace<s%> nor their <S%H2896>prosperity<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

You shall not <S%H8581>abhor<s%> an <S%H130>Edomite;<s%> for he is your <S%H251>brother:<s%> you shall not <S%H8581>abhor<s%> an <S%H4713>Egyptian;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you <S%H1961>were<s%> a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> in his <S%H776>land.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> that are <S%H3205>begotten<s%> of them shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in their <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H1755>generation.<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> <S%H3318>goes<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> your <S%H341>enemies,<s%> then <S%H8104>keep<s%> you from <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H1697>thing.<s%>

<S%H3588>If<s%> there be among you any <S%H376>man,<s%> that is not <S%H2889>clean<s%> by reason of <S%H7137>uncleanness<s%> that <S%H4745>chances<s%> him by <S%H3915>night,<s%> then shall he <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H2351>abroad<s%> out of the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> he shall not <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H4264>camp:<s%>

But it shall be, when <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H6437>comes<s%> on, he shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> himself with <S%H4325>water:<s%> and when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> is <S%H935>down,<s%> he shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H8432>into<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> again.
You shall <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> also <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> <S%H8033>where<s%> you shall <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H2351>abroad:<s%>

And you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H3489>paddle<s%> on your <S%H240>weapon;<s%> and it shall be, when you will <S%H3427>ease<s%> yourself <S%H2351>abroad,<s%> you shall <S%H2658>dig<s%> therewith, and shall <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> and <S%H3680>cover<s%> that which <S%H6627>comes<s%> from you:

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1980>walks<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of your <S%H4264>camp,<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you, and to <S%H5414>give<s%> up your <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you; therefore shall your <S%H4264>camp<s%> be <S%H6918>holy:<s%> that he <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6172>unclean<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> in you, and <S%H7725>turn<s%> away from you.
You shall not <S%H5462>deliver<s%> to his <S%H113>master<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5337>escaped<s%> from his <S%H113>master<s%> to you:

He shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with you, even <S%H7130>among<s%> you, in that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he shall <S%H977>choose<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> of your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> where it <S%H2896>likes<s%> him <S%H2896>best:<s%> you shall not <S%H3238>oppress<s%> him.
There shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6948>whore<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> a <S%H6945>sodomite<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

You shall not <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H868>hire<s%> of a <S%H2181>whore,<s%> or the <S%H4242>price<s%> of a <S%H3611>dog,<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5088>vow:<s%> for <S%H1571>even<s%> both these are <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

You shall not <S%H5391>lend<s%> on <S%H5391>usury<s%> to your <S%H251>brother;<s%> <S%H5392>usury<s%> of <S%H3701>money,<s%> <S%H5392>usury<s%> of <S%H400>victuals,<s%> <S%H5392>usury<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> that is <S%H5391>lent<s%> on <S%H5391>usury:<s%>

To a <S%H5237>stranger<s%> you may <S%H5391>lend<s%> on <S%H5391>usury;<s%> but to your <S%H251>brother<s%> you shall not <S%H5391>lend<s%> on <S%H5391>usury:<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in <S%H3605>all<s%> that you <S%H4916>set<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> to in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

<S%H3588>When<s%> you shall <S%H5087>vow<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> you shall not <S%H309>slack<s%> to <S%H7999>pay<s%> it: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will surely <S%H1875>require<s%> it of you; and it would be <S%H2399>sin<s%> in you.
But <S%H3588>if<s%> you shall <S%H2308>forbear<s%> to <S%H5088>vow,<s%> it shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2399>sin<s%> in you.

That <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H4161>gone<s%> out of your <S%H8193>lips<s%> you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> and <S%H6213>perform;<s%> even a <S%H5071>freewill<s%> offering, according as you have <S%H5087>vowed<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> which you have <S%H1696>promised<s%> with your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> you <S%H935>come<s%> into your <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> then you may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H6025>grapes<s%> your <S%H7648>fill<s%> at your own <S%H5315>pleasure;<s%> but you shall not <S%H5414>put<s%> any in your <S%H3627>vessel.<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> you <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H7054>standing<s%> <S%H7054>corn<s%> of your <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> then you may <S%H6998>pluck<s%> the <S%H4425>ears<s%> with your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> but you shall not <S%H5130>move<s%> a <S%H2770>sickle<s%> to your <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H7054>standing<s%> <S%H7054>corn.<s%>
